text: In My Dreams is the debut studio album by German recording artist Judith Lefeber. It was released by Warner Music on October 29, 2003. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2003) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" |- !scope="col"|Region !scope="col"|Date !scope="col"|Edition !scope="col"|Format !scope="col"|Label |- |Austria |rowspan="3"|October 29, 2003 | rowspan="3" | |rowspan="3"|Digital download, CD |rowspan="3"| |- |Germany |- |Switzerland |} ==References== Category:2003 debut albums Category:Judith Lefeber albums
title: In My Dreams (Judith Lefeber album)
